description: This template allows you to deploy a secure 5 node, Single Node Type Service fabric Cluster running Windows server 2012 R2 Data center on Standard_D2 Size VMs with Windows Azure diagnostics turned on. This template assumes that you already have certificates uploaded to your keyvault. This template is dependent on existing azure resources like storage accounts and vnets.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys 5 Node Service Fabric Cluster
